name: Ice Cream Parlor
description:
Story

Your Stepdad called on you to run his old ice cream parlor, Jollyjols after he fell sick. Now not only do you have to server the sickly and obnoxious children during the day. But also your old monster friends at night.

Gameplay

· Drag your cursor on tubs to get delicious ice creams.

· Click on the type of ice cream you want.

· Add on the final layer of toppings by clicking the desired condiment.

· Right Click to cancel your selection.

· Don't forget to check for what those pesky kid want by hovering the mouse over the bottom-right corner.

· And Of course be ready for the challenges the monsters throw at you!
